programmes.show_description: HarkVibez is stepping into the Desi Dancefloor Mix and blending the slickest sounds from Canada.
Jay Dahya's coming straight from the East Midlands for this week's guest DJ mix. Nothing but big summer anthems. Expect to hear music from Sukha, Drake, RDB and Sidhu Moosewala.
Pay close attention, Manara's taking you to another dimension. Lock in for a three-hour rollercoaster ride through classics, brand-new bubblers and all things nice. Contains strong language.
DJ Ishu gets into her Garage and Grime bag for this week's Pure Spice Takeover. Contains strong language.
Nonstop Asian Network bangers from the likes of Khushi K, ZAYN and Chainsmokers!

programmes.show_name: The Everyday Hustle with Harleen Nottay
programmes.show_description: Anam Mohammed joins Harleen Nottay to discuss how she set up her own PR and event company. Anam shares the moment she knew she had to become an entrepreneur.

programmes.show_name: The Everyday Hustle with Harleen Nottay
programmes.show_description: To mark Valentine's Day, Harleen Nottay speaks to expert matchmaker Naseem Mohammed about her company and to find out what you should look out for when undertaking online dating.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Motivation with Sarover Aulja
programmes.show_description: Sarover explores the power of enjoying your own company on Asian Network Motivation - embracing independence, self-worth and confidence with feel-good anthems.
AJD kicks off your Saturday with Badshah, Ezu and Sunidhi Chauhan plus an Asian Network Certified Mashup of Ali Sethi and Drum and Bass. Plus a game of Guess the Gibberish!
AJD serves up a morning of Asian Network Certified featuring hand-picked favourites to sing-along with for 60 minutes including Nish, Tesher and Neha Kakkar.
Big tunes as we celebrate Tiger Shroff's birthday, and Tanu Weds Manu turns 15! Which Tiger film track will you chose for This or That - you're the DJ before 12!

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Certified Throwbacks with Vallisa
programmes.show_description: Certified Throwbacks in the mix from Pras to PBN, and M.I.A to Missy Elliott! Bollywood, Bhangra, hip-hop, R&B, UK garage and British Asian beats all mashed up!
Bobby Friction brings the energy, tunes and fun vibes to your radio!
DJ Kizzi soundtracks your Saturday nights with the biggest and best tunes, Asian anthems and mixes.
All my people on the floor, let me see you DANCE. The Maharani of mixes is back with a three hour showcase of uplifting flavours, dark club rollers and new finds. Contains strong language.
Kicking off the first week of his Takeover, Gunni steps up with a heavyweight blend of South Asian bangers, UK heat and everything in between! Expect the unexpected! Contains strong language.
AJD sits in for Kizzi soundtracking your Saturday nights with the biggest and best tunes, Asian anthems and mixes.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Club Hit Squad Mix
programmes.show_description: Panjabi Hit Squad are stepping into the Club Hit Squad experience with a big 30-minute Asian hip-hop mix, bringing pure club vibes straight to your speakers.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Club Hit Squad Mix
programmes.show_description: Love is in the air... and so is the bass. Dee and Rav are setting the mood this Valentine's, delivering a soundtrack smoother than Usher.
Gagan Grewal celebrates the icon that is Karisma Kapoor, playing some of her best interview clips and talking you through her incredible filmography.
Get ready to feel every beat with Gagan's Bollywood tabla tunes! He's bringing you a handpicked collection of Bollywood hits featuring the mesmerising rhythms of the tabla.
Vallisa brings you Bollywood Companions, a beautiful collection of iconic tracks that all have the word Saathiya in common.
Nonstop Asian Network bangers!
Ease into Sunday with AJD with a warm selection of music from Bhangra, Bollywood, Bangladeshi beats and Tamil tracks. Perfect for a relaxed start.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Certified Throwbacks with AJD
programmes.show_description: AJD takes you back with Asian Network Certified Throwbacks, celebrating tracks that defined moments in the past and still hit hard today.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Bollywood with Gagan Grewal
programmes.show_description: March into nostalgia with Gagan Grewal as he brings you the best in throwback Bollywood! Expect to hear tunes from Shraddha Kapoor movies and vocals by Shankar Mahadevan and more!

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Punjabi with Dipps Bhamrah
programmes.show_description: Dipps hits play on fresh selections from Sukhshinder Shinda, G Khan, Mickey Singh and En Karma, keeping your playlist current and familiar with the sounds you love.
...Entertainment Show with DJ Kye. Discover new Bengali beats from Jai Wolf & Habib Wahid and kick back with Senti Sunday! The ideal soundtrack for a Sunday afternoon with DJ Kye sitting in.
...Entertainment Show with Kan D Man. Pakistani music, entertainment and news with Kan D Man.
...and Tamil Entertainment Show with Pritt. Love South Indian and Tamil music? Then you need to tune into Pritt as she brings you all the best beats from this part of the globe and the diaspora.
Bobby Friction tips BBB, Yung Sammy and Wamp for big things in Future Friction, Schooling the Nation breaks down Dard-E-Disco plus a Live Jam from Tazzz and Priti Menon. Contains strong language.
Shankeya and Saima try figure out if they would survive each other's household! Contains some strong language and adult humour.
SMASHBengali is joined by Shankeya, sitting in for Gura. They discuss the times when we have to code switch like when you really want to clap back to a troll online.
